## icons.CommentState interface

The save state format for a comment icon.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface CommentState 
```

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |

|  [pinned?](./blockly.icons.commentstate.pinned.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ True if the comment is open, false otherwise. |
